definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Her throat and lower abdomen were slashed.
sentences.chinese: 咽喉和下腹部各有一道伤口。

sentences.english: Bloating or swelling of the lower abdomen may be present in many intestinal (bowel) conditions including irritable bowel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 下腹部的胀气可能是由于肠道疾病包括小肠综合征。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tumescent liposuction technique is a simple, safe and effective technique to substract fat.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下腹部肿胀吸脂术的疗效与并发症的预防。

sentences.english: She tells him that she is having pains in her lower abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉医生，她感到下腹部处有疼痛。

sentences.english: B CT scan of the lower abdomen shows beaking and collapsed bowel loops at the retrocecal recess.
sentences.chinese: 下腹部CT扫描显示盲肠后隐窝处肠管塌陷呈鸟嘴征。

sentences.english: Reduce waistline, thus shaping next abdomen form shape, make the waist and fine.
sentences.chinese: 减少腰围，从而塑造下腹部的形状，使腰部纤细。

sentences.english: Relatively weak abdominal and lower back muscles might also contribute to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果腰背部或者下腹部肌肉很弱也可能导致一些问题。

sentences.english: Does leg rasing induce pain in the right or left lower quadrant?
sentences.chinese: 腿抬高是否会导致右边或者左边的下腹部疼痛？

sentences.english: Objective To explore curative effect and prevention of complication of tumescent Liposuction technique .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下腹部肿胀吸脂术的疗效与并发症的预防。

sentences.english: Hot pad or water bottle place to lower abdominal region or lower back.
sentences.chinese: 可以放一个热水袋或水樽到女孩的下腹部或腰部。

sentences.english: The pain, which began ( originated) in the R. L. Q. , soon became localized in the L. U. Q.
sentences.chinese: 起于右下腹部的疼痛，不久便局限于左上腹部。

definition: rectus abdominis muscle (aka abdominals or abs)
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
